channel.title: [317]allstar source Error trying to add Npc protection from bombs client
channel.description: [code]client.java:15589: illegal start of expression public static int NpcAtkRequests = 0; ^ client.java:15589: illegal start of expression public static int NpcAtkRequests = 0; ^ client.java:15589: ';' expected public static int NpcAtkRequests =0; ^ 3 errors You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .[/code] thats my 3 errors. i just dont know where to put [code]public static int NpcAtkRequests = 0; [/code] in client.java
